GSD.description:
PM: hibernate: defer device probing when resuming from hibernation

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.291 by commit 8c90947e5f1801e6c7120021c6ea0f3ad6a4eb91. For more details please see the references link.
